actions.title: atoz.letter.programmes.get
actions.description: Get the Programmes whose title begins with the given initial character.

letter.description: Letter to search by, a to z or the string '0-9'

rights.description: The rights group to limit results to.

per_page.description: The number of results to return.

initial_child_count.description: The depth to return child entities.

sort.description: The sort order of the results.

sort_direction.description: Whether to sort ascending or descending

availability.description: Whether to return all, or available programmes

actions.title: Get_Status_
actions.description: Get the current iPlayer business layer status. This tells the caller the status of the iPlayer data, but not necessarily the overall status of the website. In the future it might include the status of the dependent data services within the BBC.
